definition: so lacking in interest as to cause mental weariness, the act of drilling a hole in the earth in the hope of producing petroleum
details:
adjective
- so lacking in interest as to cause mental weariness
= example: so lacking in interest as to cause mental weariness
= synonyms: slow
noun
- the act of drilling a hole in the earth in the hope of producing petroleum
= synonyms: drilling
- the act of drilling
= synonyms: drilling
